scenario_text.value:
All of you have must have been desperate
out here, huh?

To hold out and survive in a world like
this...I have to admit I’m impressed.

(I wonder if I could have held on this long
myself...)

(Well, no point in worrying about it.
Best focus on the task at hand.)
Yo, Takuma!
Hey, Minoru.
You talked with everyone, right? How’d it go?

I learned how awful these past ten days have
been for everyone.

Yeah... First you and Agumon just vanish,
then Haru goes missing...

The fog’s been getter thicker, and the
enemies won’t let up on their attacks.
And then, there’s Miyuki...
Miyuki?
Oh, uh... I mean...

(Is it really that hard to talk about what’s
going on with her?)
(I want to ask him about it somehow, but...)
(How should I ask him?)
Ask what’s wrong.
Ask him straight.
Tell him your side.
Ask what’s wrong.

Everyone’s been pretty evasive. What’s going
on? Why don’t they want to talk about Miyuki?

It’s just that...they don’t wanna talk about
it. We’ve been friends for so long, so...
So? So what?
Ask him straight.

What did Kaito mean when he said that
Miyuki’s “already done for”?

Oh man... Just gonna rip the band-aid right
off, then?

Answer me, please. What is Miyuki doing now,
and where is she?
Yeah... All right.
Tell him your side.
Minoru. About Miyuki...
Yeah, uh, right...
I was with Miyuki back in our world.

I know I talked about her being the key to
creating a gate between worlds, but...

She was a normal girl, shocked at how the
world had changed since she’d last seen it.

C’mon, Minoru, tell me what’s going on
with her.
...Okay, man.

You’re right, Takuma... I gotta tell you
what’s going on, don’t I?

...Huh? Hey Takuma, don’t you think the fog’s
getting thicker again?
...Yeah, you’re right.
Oh man... It’s coming this way!
Hey, what...what’s that sound?!
It came from the cafeteria!

It’s Aoi’s signal that bad guys are comin’!
Let’s roll!
Hey guys, everyone get over here! Quick!
Ah, Takuma!
You guys’re late!
Sooorry!
What happened?!

...I’m afraid the time has come to fulfill
that promise.
Promise?

I told you I’d talk about Miyuki later,
didn’t I?
But the truth is...she’s over there.
What?!
Miyuki...?!

Don’t get any closer, Takuma!
Miyuki is...leading the enemy?!
...O pitiful offerings.

Life and death, creation itself, all bend to
my will. Your fates are already sealed.
Miyuki...? What the heck are you saying?!
What happened to you, Miyuki?!
Miyuki is channeling the Master.
Maybe it’s better to say she’s possessed?
The Master... You don’t mean...!

No way... It’s me, Takuma!
Don’t you recognize me? Miyuki!

Answer me!
Please, Miyuki!!!
It’s no use. Miyuki doesn’t react no matter what happens.

We need to face the enemy if we want to
survive anyway!

This...may come as a shock, Takuma, but we’ve
had to face this reality for a few days, now.
Go on, howl!
Oh no, here they come!!!
Let’s hold them off!
